item.title: how to attend Harvard
item.description: going to Harvard at my home I’ve been studying web development since last week.and I had a chance to learn some of the basics of computer science. It got me interested and throughout the weekend I wanted to study more CS so I look up what the actual computer science class teaches. item.title: lecture 4-network
